main.name: Taha Mulla
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Taha! I've been coding for over 2 years now. As a Full-Stack Software Developer, I specialize in building efficient, scalable applications using modern web technologies. My technical expertise includes JavaScript, React, Express.js, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, and SASS. I have hands-on experience developing multi-page platforms and dynamic scheduling tools, implementing secure authentication, and ensuring application stability through comprehensive testing. My background in IT support has honed my troubleshooting abilities and enhanced my collaborative skills, enabling me to deliver user-centric solutions effectively. I am passionate about continuous learning and am committed to expanding my technical expertise to stay abreast of industry advancements.

education.degree: Certification, Junior QA and Security Analyst

work.title: Team Lead / Driver
work.description: Managed daily logistics and optimized delivery routes, maintaining a 95-100% success rate. Provided excellent customer service, addressing inquiries and resolving shipment issues. Ensured accurate documentation and efficient coordination with dispatch teams.

work.title: Facility Operations
work.description: Maintained facility operations and ensured a safe, clean learning environment. Coordinated with vendors for specialized repairs and maintenance projects. Responded to service requests and emergencies in a timely manner

work.title: Technical Deskside Support
work.description: Provided IT support, resolving an average of 25 daily tickets via ServiceNow with 90% first-contact resolution. Installed and configured hardware/software for new users, improving setup efficiency by 20%. Collaborated with Technology Service Groups to enhance IT service delivery.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
